response.original_title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Hitler and the Beer Hall Putsch
response.overview: One of the great ironies of history that Hitlerâ€™s first assignment after the Great War was to help the Bavarian army to identify extremist political parties then to infiltrate and report back. One such party infiltrated by Hitler was the tiny German Workers Party. Hitler not only infiltrated the party but he took ownership, wrote a new manifesto and turned it into the Nazi party.
response.title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Hitler and the Beer Hall Putsch
